name: Minn & Maks: Math Twin Rescue
description:
Minn & Maks: Math Twin Rescue is a math puzzle adventure game, based on the 1993 MS-DOS game "Sir Addalot's Math Adventure'.

You play as either Maks OR Minn. The sibling that wasn't chosen will be kidnapped by the evil witch Mathilde and taken deep into the woods. Mathilde has recruited monsters to do her bidding, and will do whatever it takes to stop you from meddling in her plans.
Make matches with the cards spread around every stage and clear your way to rescue your twin and defeat the witch!

The game features 4 different stages, each with a unique monster to defeat.
You can customize your playthrough by choosing the difficulty of the run and the operations to be shown in the cards (adding, subtracting, multiplying or dividing). 

-- Project made for a Game Design class --
